description: MoKo Capacitive Stylus and Pen allows you to use your capacitive touch screen devices comfortably and accurately, without ever touching the screen with your fingers. The perfect design of stylus and pen makes it easy to take notes, draw, play games or simply turn a page. The premium quality fabric tip of the lastest special technology functions perfectly with any capacitive touch screens, without scratching the screen of your device. Compatible with all capacitive touch screen devices - Apple iPad,iPad2,iPad3,iPad4,iPad Air,mini,mini 2, iPhone 4s and iPod Touch,Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 / 3 /4 10.1, 7.0, 7.7, 8.9,Tab Pro 8.4, 10.1, Tab 3 Lite, Note & Note Pro 12.2,700T,Google Nexus 7,10,Nexus 8, DELL Venue 8 Pro,Nokia Lumia, Lenovo tablet K3,S6000, MIIX 2,Yoga 10,A1000,thinkpad tablet, SONY ExperiaZ, Z2,ASUS ME302C,ME400C, ME301T,LG Gpad 8.3,Surface RT / Pro, S,P, ACER Iconia tab A200,A500,A510,A700,blackberry Playbook 7, Epad,nook color, hp touchpad,slate,HTC and Many More
